definition[0]: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc
example[0]: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
example[2]: The eggs hatch  (=break open to allow the baby out) in 26 days.
definition[1]: an egg, especially one from a chicken, that is used for food
example[3]: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
example[4]: Whisk the egg white  (=the white part) until stiff.
example[5]: Beat in two of the egg yolks  (=the yellow part).
definition[2]: something the same shape as an egg
definition[3]: a cell produced by a woman or female animal that combines with sperm (=male cell) to make a baby
